Title: Tigh Me Up, Tigh Me Down
Plot: President Roslin's fears that Commander Adama is a Cylon are stoked when she learns he's making secret wireless calls to other ships. Then, to make things worse, a single Cylon raider appears near the Galactica and begins acting strangely after being damaged in battle.
GuestStars: Richard Hatch, Kate Vernon, Robert Wisden, David Kaye, Alex Zahara, Patrick Gallagher, Malcolm Stewart, Michael Hogan
